vendor_name: Kiahuna Plantation Resort Kauai by OUTRIGGER
title: Tropical Kauai Self-Contained Condo Escape on Poipu Beach with 35 Acres of Tropical Gardens
description:
Experience a generous slice of Hawaiian tropical bliss at this oceanfront oasis, tucked on the sunny southern shores of Kauai, overlooking the stunning Poipu Beach. Ensconced amid lush cactus and orchid gardens, relish the island luxury in the property's charming self-contained condos, imbued with premium amenities and lulled by balmy breeze.

If you're not spending time at the beach, head to the Poipu Beach Athletic Club and take a dip in the pool, serve and volley it up at the tennis court or feast on ocean-fresh delicacies at the Cabana Bar & Grill. Venture beyond the resort to explore the Waimea Canyon, also known as the 'Grand Canyon of the Pacific'.
location_description: Kiahuna Plantation Resort Kauai by OUTRIGGER
offer_address: 2253 Poipu Road, Poipu, Koloa, Hawaii 96756, USA
